title: Nemesis Draft Battle Boost Restrictions?
body: Never encountered Battle Boost previously. Just wondering why all skins aren't unlocked when you pay for Battle Boost. Is there a list of skins that won't be unlocked in this mode or should I just count skins you cannot purchase at this moment?

replies.body:
Hey Serpos,

It should grant you all the skins available for purchase in the store for the champ you have selected. Does that make sense?

-Terra

> [{quoted}](name=RiotTerra,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a2rQehUv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-13T00:29:14.174+0000)
>

> It should grant you all the skins available for purchase in the store for the champ you have selected. Does that make sense?

Its disappointing that we can't access legacy skins, but I guess its fair enough. It would be cool though. This let's us use ultimate skins though? :O
Also, look at this thread Terra, please: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/cFtEgtBl-riot-will-never-find-this-thread - just because they don't want Riot to see it.

Yes, that does make sense. I was just a bit baffled when I couldn't select Reaper Soraka when I first played this mode with Battle Boost activated.

Thank you for the response. Peace.
